item.title: Daggers As Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

TeleNubby:

I dont mean to sound like an idiot, but how would you make the server compatible with the client. I mean how hard could it be ( people say it could take months? ), can’t you just do a little editing on the way the login packets work, then connect to it and you’re done? Or would you also have to recode the multiplayer bit and such?

I really don’t fully understand it either, I have a 377 deob and it can connect to the server.

About this far…

Then it disconnects me…

I’ve been working on it for a while and still don’t get whats causing it…so I’m trying to compare the 377 login packet to the 317

 if(k == 2)
            {
                anInt867 = aClass17_1024.method225();
                aBoolean962 = aClass17_1024.method225() == 1;
                aLong902 = 0L;
                anInt1299 = 0;
                aClass7_1248.anInt136 = 0;
                super.aBoolean19 = true;
                aBoolean1275 = true;
                aBoolean1137 = true;
                aClass50_Sub1_Sub2_964.anInt1454 = 0;
                aClass50_Sub1_Sub2_1188.anInt1454 = 0;
                anInt870 = -1;
                anInt903 = -1;
                anInt904 = -1;
                anInt905 = -1;
                anInt869 = 0;
                anInt871 = 0;
                anInt1057 = 0;
                anInt873 = 0;
                anInt1197 = 0;
                anInt1183 = 0;
                aBoolean1065 = false;
                super.anInt20 = 0;
                for(int j1 = 0; j1 < 100; j1++)
                    aStringArray1298[j1] = null;

                anInt1146 = 0;
                anInt1171 = 0;
                anInt1071 = 0;
                anInt1035 = 0;
                anInt853 = (int)(Math.random() * 100D) - 50;
                anInt1009 = (int)(Math.random() * 110D) - 55;
                anInt1255 = (int)(Math.random() * 80D) - 40;
                anInt916 = (int)(Math.random() * 120D) - 60;
                anInt1233 = (int)(Math.random() * 30D) - 20;
                anInt1252 = (int)(Math.random() * 20D) - 10 & 0x7ff;
                anInt1050 = 0;
                anInt1276 = -1;
                anInt1120 = 0;
                anInt1121 = 0;
                anInt971 = 0;
                anInt1133 = 0;
                for(int i2 = 0; i2 < anInt968; i2++)
                {
                    aClass50_Sub1_Sub4_Sub3_Sub2Array970[i2] = null;
                    aClass50_Sub1_Sub2Array975[i2] = null;
                }

                for(int k2 = 0; k2 < 16384; k2++)
                    aClass50_Sub1_Sub4_Sub3_Sub1Array1132[k2] = null;

                aClass50_Sub1_Sub4_Sub3_Sub2_1167 = aClass50_Sub1_Sub4_Sub3_Sub2Array970[anInt969] = new Class50_Sub1_Sub4_Sub3_Sub2();
                aClass6_1282.method162();
                aClass6_1210.method162();
                for(int l2 = 0; l2 < 4; l2++)
                {
                    for(int i3 = 0; i3 < 104; i3++)
                    {
                        for(int k3 = 0; k3 < 104; k3++)
                            aClass6ArrayArrayArray1323[l2][i3][k3] = null;

                    }

                }

                aClass6_1261 = new Class6(true);
                anInt860 = 0;
                anInt859 = 0;
                anInt1191 = -1;
                anInt988 = -1;
                anInt1169 = -1;
                anInt1053 = -1;
                anInt960 = -1;
                anInt1089 = -1;
                anInt1279 = -1;
                aBoolean1239 = false;
                anInt1285 = 3;
                anInt1244 = 0;
                aBoolean1065 = false;
                aBoolean866 = false;
                aString1058 = null;
                anInt1319 = 0;
                anInt1213 = -1;
                aBoolean1144 = true;
                method25(anInt1015);

item.title: Daggers As Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Mopar Darth Mopar
item.description:
@Darth_Mopar wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:7, topic:133421”][quote author=Darth Mopar link=topic=184678.msg1673590#msg1673590 date=1187091611]
Where on my C drive? If that is so, I NEED THAT CACHE.
[/quote]

/fail, /wrists, /quit. Whatever way I put it, it cannot sum up your epic failure.

With all of the much smarter people on these forums (albeit only 10 or so actual smart people here), don’t you think one would have already thought of this? The newest cache isn’t used for a reason, WE CAN’T WITH THE CURRENT CLIENT. Unless someone creates a client using the new engine, and makes it connect to a private server, and then them or another person creates a brand new server, with most things working so that you noobs are able to add your beloved commands, the cache is totally useless.

Take your finger out of your ass, and start using your brain.[/quote]
You know what? You don’t need to be flaming me JUST because I’m sort of experienced in Java, but can’t do shit with a cache, all I can say is that SOMEONE, idc who, needs to make a client so servers would be better, because my server and server’s everywhere are all SHIT.

Read full topic

item.title: Daggers As Defenders?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Daggers as Defenders can be done in pretty much any cache -.-

Just goto Item.JAVA, find the item id of the dagger you want to switch, remove it from the weapon line, and add it in the shield spot to make it fit in with the others (You will most likely have to do it for two shield spots). Then goto items.cfg or w/e and then change the stats it gives to defense stats.

Read full topic
